outline.title: Xandeum pNode Analytics Platform
outline.summary: Title slide introducing the platform with live URL and GitHub repository links. Enterprise-grade real-time monitoring for Xandeum storage network.

outline.title: Platform transforms passive monitoring into proactive intelligence
outline.summary: Explains how the platform moves beyond static metrics to deliver automated intelligence through continuous scanning, health scoring, and real-time alerts.

outline.title: Real-time network discovery reveals comprehensive pNode ecosystem health
outline.summary: Shows network statistics: 242 pNodes across 20 countries, 92/100 health score breakdown, version distribution analysis.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/pasted_file_5xc888_image.png - The image directly illustrates the core concepts of this slide: the composite health score (92 Healthy), total nodes (242), online status (100%), countries (20), and version distribution.

outline.title: Performance alerts detect critical issues across four monitoring dimensions
outline.summary: Details the alert system with CPU/RAM thresholds, severity classification, and automated detection capabilities.

outline.title: Automated RPC accessibility scanning maps network connectivity patterns
outline.summary: Describes background scanning every 5 minutes, accessibility intelligence, and backend proxy for private nodes.

outline.title: Intelligent rankings evaluate nodes across multiple performance dimensions
outline.summary: Explains weighted composite scoring algorithm evaluating uptime, version currency, RPC accessibility, and geographic diversity.

outline.title: Storage capacity tracking provides unprecedented infrastructure visibility
outline.summary: Details the unique storage tracking feature: sortable storage column in Rankings (GB/TB format with scores), Performance trends integration with historical charts, network storage aggregation on Dashboard, and storage scoring (up to 20 points). Emphasizes this is the only pNode analytics platform exposing storage metrics.
outline.image_plan: No image needed - focus on data visualization concepts

outline.title: Storage credits integration creates single source of truth for operators
outline.summary: Explains the podcredits.xandeum.network API integration: sortable Credits column with thousands separators (47,944 credits), backend CORS proxy for seamless access, 30-minute smart caching, pubkey matching across 216 pods, and competitive advantage as the only platform displaying credits alongside performance metrics.
outline.image_plan: No image needed - focus on integration architecture

outline.title: Historical performance tracking reveals trends and predicts capacity issues
outline.summary: Details 24-hour tracking with 5-minute snapshots, four interactive charts, and automated data collection.

outline.title: Production-quality user experience delivers intuitive professional interface
outline.summary: Highlights glassmorphism design, smooth animations, loading states, responsive layouts, and micro-interactions.

outline.title: Geographic visualization and automated insights provide situational awareness
outline.summary: Shows interactive global map with clustering, automated insight generation, and geographic diversity assessment.

outline.title: Platform exceeds baseline requirements across all judging criteria
outline.summary: Evaluates platform against Functionality, Clarity, User Experience, and Innovation criteria.

outline.title: Technical architecture ensures scalability and maintainability
outline.summary: Details frontend stack (React, TypeScript, Tailwind), backend infrastructure (Node.js, PostgreSQL), and deployment.

outline.title: Platform delivers measurable operator value
outline.summary: Quantifies operational efficiency gains, network health benefits, and decision support capabilities.

outline.title: Future enhancements expand platform capabilities
outline.summary: Outlines planned features (configurable alerts, multi-node comparison) and scalability roadmap.

outline.title: Comprehensive documentation ensures accessibility
outline.summary: Lists submission package contents and developer resources available on GitHub.

outline.title: Platform represents first-place excellence
outline.summary: Final slide summarizing why the platform deserves first place with live URL and GitHub links.
